replies.body:
Hey **Riot** 
One thing I really miss from switching to the Beta Client is the ability to see recently played players in the list on the right hand side. I often want to play with some of those players or check out their match history/ranking but I am unable to because "Recently Played" is no longer in that section. I have to now go to my match history, look at the players name and remember it as i type it in either "Invite" or "Search for Summoner."  In reality, I'm more likely to be directed away from the League Client and head to op.gg for my recently played opponents/teammates stats because I dont have to type in a name there

Please resinstate that function into the Beta Client (ability to invite/view recently played).
Also, why cant I view my friends list and chat with people (other than the boxes i already had open) once I enter champ select? 

Thanks!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

On the right side where all your friends are listed, there should be an icon near the top to add friends. Click it, and underneath the search there will be a list of recently played people and what champs they were playing

This is true, but its not comprehensive like the old client was. It only picks a few people of recently played to put in this section and you cant click them and invite them to a game or view their profile
This is helpful as we think of ways to improve the recently played experience.  What else would you want to see/do with recently played?

Remember which ones left or were AFK... so you can report them. Remember which ones were really nice... so you can honor/ friend them.
(This is if you forget to after a match.)
It would be nice if you could honor/ report from that list also.

We were able to see the champion the person played next to their summoner name, being able to identify who it was that we played with. Like, I remember that awesome Braum support, I want to friend him, or invite him to another game or such.
I'd like to see the honor system being used more effectively.  I feel like that feature isn't really used anymore.  The icons for it were more prevalent in the old client as well.
The new client is a piece of shite.
Well it is a beta and Rito has repeatedly stated that.
I'm still waiting for practice tool.
Same! hope it comes soon.
Don't click the link please. It's a trap!

> [{quoted}](name=MeleeNuke,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=YaMlATNl,comment-id=0001000100010001,timestamp=2017-01-11T01:49:44.132+0000)
>
> Don't click the link please. It's a trap!

The downvote bots got you... :(
You're right though. Good to comment on every one of these scams and tell people. Next time, report the post too by going to the appropriate Announcements thread on the Boards and clicking the Report button. Report the post for spam.
For example, [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/YaMlATNl-patch-71-notes) is the Announcements thread for this post.
Jesus Christ that is actually scary. I kinda wish Riot would do better with controlling all these bots...
At least you can add bots to your custom games... I know it's not the same but you won't have to play an entire game just to try out a new build, combo or champion.
I'm still waiting for them to revert Malzahar 6.23 changes.
I liked the old Malzahar better too.
That's nice and all but.... where are item sets on the new client??? Why is this not a priority since it was a base function of the other client???

YEESSS!!! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE add item sets back into the client. They were sooooo useful for keeping track of various builds for the same champion, for example. Like, "Wait, was the defensive item for this build Banshee's Veil or GA? Or was that the third?" HUH?

I second this, give us back our custom item sets! 
So we can edit them, it should be a priority.

They've already stated that not enough people were using the feature so they decided to axe it. After some feedback they said if they implement the feature it will be after the new client has been implemented and the legacy client has been removed entirely. It's not a priority--and it's not even guaranteed to be implemented.

Whoa whoa whoa, at what point did they say they were going to axe it? I've been following this this topic pretty diligently, and the closest, legitimate word from riot I have found relating to what you just said is that the item set feature was just slapped onto the legacy client. Since they did a brand new client, they have to make a brand new program and implement it in order for players to use it on the new client as the old program is not compatible. Also, they said they would like to input it into the new client, but as many other things are more of a priority, it probably won't come out till it is out of beta and the legacy client is no longer being used. I'm 100% positive it will come into the new client, just not anytime soon and if you can find evidence of them saying they will axe it, please show me.

He's right that originally we were saying we'd axe it, and that we later backed away from that in response to player requests. Sorry it's still not super clear because we're sticking figuring out the specifics internally. Here's the latest update on it: http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/ask-riot-the-future-of-the-client-update/
It isn't a game breaking bug but {{champion:9}} 's animations still completely stop once he's been standing still for a few seconds.
It was intended for {{champion:9}} to stay completely still after a few seconds. It was updated to be like that back in season 6
Oh I didn't know it was intentional. Thanks for letting me know!

**HEY RIOT SOME THINGS TO LOOK INTO** 

**1. BE ABLE TO CHANGE/BUILD RUNES IN CHAMP SELECT NOT ONLY MASTERIES
2. PING METER ON THE CLIENT
3 BE ABLE TO MINIMIZE THE CHAT AND NOT HAVE IT ALL THE TIME UP**

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
They'll probably never do #1 because then almost nobody will buy extra rune pages, translating into less profit.

YUP 

I forgot that RIOT its a money sucking B**** that only cares about profit 

BUT i just posted it hoping to get a response from them
man it sucks when companies care about making money for their work. i hate it when they dont give me everything for free
Yay another month of ADCs being useless

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend&roleSort=ADC

11 of the 18 adcs have positive winrates.

Dont think you know what useless means.

Come back to me when adcs hit 28% winrates like old nunu used to be. Now HE was useless.

That's literally only possible if having an ADC is so bad that a mage is better in 62% of games--which isn't realistic due to the way structures function in League. Because ADC's are picked in almost every game they as a role will always have a winrate that hovers between 40-60% Because _someone has to lose and someone has to win_ even though both team have an ADC. 

Also, winrate is in no way indicative of the effectiveness of a role when all five roles are static. The only way winrate can show you effectiveness is when you're looking at specific champions within a single role. It will tell you absolutely nothing about the role itself.
Ikr? Its like everyone at riot got stomped by an ADC at one point so now they want revenge.
its like Riot staff members had no mana
You nerf leesin at a 49% winrate but dont nerf vi at a 54% winrate LOL.

Winrate doesn't mean everything. Lee sin's winrate gets dragged down by all the people who are trash at him. He consistently has an extremely high pick rate. Search his winrate at D+ elo and you can tell he's doing well.

RIP Red Side jungle. If a jungler want to take raptors, they have to lose a lot of health because Raptors deals too much damage. If they take Krugs, they'll be a level behind the opposing jungler because Krugs give 75% less exp on first clear but takes twice as long to clear. Basically forcing everyone to start Blue Side Jungle.

> FIRST CLEAR Murkwolf, Raptor, Krug, and Gromp camps grant 25% less experience on first clear (stacks additively with Ancient Krug’s 50% reduced experience on first clear)

My screenshot in PBE showing you can't even reach level 2 from Krugs after killing the entire camp: http://i.imgur.com/d2nnoVW.jpg
Every other camp is better than Krugs.
Why would you ever start Krugs?

It's just for comparison sake. Every camp at lv 1 gets you to level 2, except for Krugs. This just shows Krugs is a double whammy.
✦Krugs takes twice as long to clear than other camps.
✦Also gives less exp than other camps.

Even if you do Krugs at level 2, which most people will, it will still give way less exp than any other camp.

YES!! Finally someone else agrees. 

Pretty much, as any JG (except graves seems to be the opposite) it is an awful idea to try to kill raptors. If you take red buff, you lose about 1/3hp with a good leash. Then you smite to get back to ~full hp. Then you go to krugs, and lose maybe another 1/3(without smite). But those raptors. Omg. Even with 2/3 hp, if you don't have smite, you're dead. Literally. 

I usually skip raptors entirely. The little ones do too much dmg and aren't worth any gold. Sometimes I try to kill the big one real quick for the gold boost, but you still take too much free dmg for the 60 gold. I'd rather heal up on Rift Scuttle for more gold. I think the attack speed, damage, and hp on the small raptors is just stupid. That being said, the AS, dmg, and hp on the big one needs to go up. With any other jg monster, at any particular point in the game, smite will typically deal like 1/3-1/4 of its HP. At any level, Smite does almost 85% of the big raptor's hp.
Any idea on when item sets will be implemented on the new client?
Still waiting for customizable pre-game item set...still waiting...

> SERIOUSLY, TRY LOW-SPEC MODE IF YOU'RE HAVING PERFORMANCE PROBLEMS.
 
**Currently the low-spec mode changes NOTHING for me, the only time the new client slows my computer is during the champ select. So i hope i can finally play on the new client after this patch...
**

I am not sure if Riot will read this, but by stating, "the days of map-specific balancing for strength alone are behind us." under the Twisted Treeline category, are you saying that you will not update the map anymore? Sorry, I am just a little confused by the statement. Any clarification on the statement would be greatly appreciated because I do like the Twisted Treeline, and I am very involved.
I think it means champions are no longer different than they are on the Rift.

That is what it means... Syndra and Wukong were the only two left that were underpowered (or overpowered) from differences in Twisted Treeline to Summoner's Rift, from lack of available nearby enemy champions, per se.

(At least I think that is what it means)
